## LeagueEntry.promos property

This only exists if the summoner is in a promotion series.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly promos?: {
        readonly target: number;
        readonly wins: number;
        readonly losses: number;
        readonly progress: string;
    };
```
